channel.title: Help with Highscores
channel.description:
Hey.
I have a 317 PI. I did the highscores tutorial. On my site you get this
Warning: mysql_result(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in /home/content/04/7813104/html/vexenda/highscores/functions.php on line 334 No database selected
Something is wrong with functions.php and I didn't touch anything. Can anyone help?

item.title: Help with Highscores
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You cannot pay for services and the problem isn’t functions.php. You failed to create the database and/or you named the database incorrectly.

Read full topic
